Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the content of the GMA News report by adding the false information about a delivery driver being tricked into delivering a severed head.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the screenshot was digitally altered to include the reference to the severed head, while the original report mentioned victims of fake bookings.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a doctored photo and false information.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the screenshot is a genuine report by GMA News, when in fact it is a manipulated image.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the blogs sharing the doctored photos are not connected to the GMA News organization.
